data_description.local_api_key: A local API key can be obtained through activating the local API on your Vestaboard using a local API enablement token. Please select "I have a local API enablement token and need a local API key" in the previous step if you do not have a local API key.

ask_need_local_api_key.title: Setup Vestaboard Local API
ask_need_local_api_key.description:
If you have enabled local API on your Vestaboard before, you should have a local API key. Otherwise you will need to get a local API enablement token from Vestaboard directly. You can submit for a local API enablement token [here](https://www.vestaboard.com/local-api).  
*Note: re-enabling local API using your local API enablement token is possible, but will invalidate existing local API keys.*
